context.note: Note that at present all the documents to be visualized in Voyant need to come from a single collection. Sub-collections will not be visualized.

step.cmd: Create or identify the collection that you want to visualize.
step.info: Remember that you can select a large collection and then work with subsets of it within Voyant.

step.cmd: Navigate to the collection within CWRC.
Copy the URL from the results page.
Paste the URL into the upload box and click on "Reveal".
